title: Optional game rating requirements for Brazil and Korea
body: Many small developers skip Brazil and Korea from worldwide distribution because there are mandatory rating agency requirements.

comments.body: took some time, but it's finally here: https://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2016/01/06/now-available-single-age-rating-system-to-simplify-app-submissions/

As a user, I think it is killing WP in Brazil.
I cant install a lot of cool games because my phone was purchased in Brazil.
